pre_text_caption_evidence: and subsidiaries management 2019s discussion and analysis during periods in which we have significantly more positive net revenue days than net revenue loss days , we expect to have fewer var exceptions because , under normal conditions , our business model generally produces positive net revenues .
in periods in which our franchise revenues are adversely affected , we generally have more loss days , resulting in more var exceptions .

the daily net revenues for positions included in var used to determine var exceptions reflect the impact of any intraday activity , including bid/offer net revenues , which are more likely than not to be positive by their nature .
sensitivity measures certain portfolios and individual positions are not included in var because var is not the most appropriate risk measure .
